#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

char str[5000005];
int Z[5000005];

void getZarr()
{
    int n = strlen(str);
    int L, R, k;
 
    L = R = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i)
    {
        if (i > R)
        {
            L = R = i;
            while (R<n && str[R-L] == str[R])
                R++;
            Z[i] = R-L;
            R--;
        }
        else
        {
            k = i-L;
            if (Z[k] < R-i+1)
                 Z[i] = Z[k];
            else
            {
                L = i;
                while (R<n && str[R-L] == str[R])
                    R++;
                Z[i] = R-L;
                R--;
            }
        }
    }
}

int main()
{
	scanf("%s",str);
	getZarr();
	int q,p;
	scanf("%d",&q);
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&p);
		if(Z[p]>p)
			printf("%d\n",p);
		else
			printf("%d\n",Z[p]);
	}
	return 0;
}
